## SourceMapping.symbolLocations property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Maps symbol name to its source location in the input file. The key should match the symbol name in the ProcessResult.symbols map.

**Signature:**

```typescript
symbolLocations: Map<string, SourceLocation>;
```
